channel.title: Turning On Trump on Hennessy's View
channel.description: Recent content in Turning On Trump on Hennessy's View

item.title: Hennessy on Breitbart News Radio: Audio
item.description: I was a guest of Breitbart News Daily on SiriusXM channel 125 yesterday. Dan Riehl wrote this very nice story about my appearance on Breitbart News: Tea Party activist Bill Hennessy chronicled his transition from Donald Trump opposition to Trump supporter in the book Turning on Trump and shared some of his insights with_Breitbart News Daily_ SiriusXM host Stephen K. Bannon Wednesday. “I started off very anti-Trump,” said Hennessy, “and over the course of the primary season, I did a complete one-eighty.

item.title: Trump-Talking on The Allman Report
item.description: Jamie Allman overstates my accomplishments, but I had a great time on The Allman Report talking Trump and my new book, Turning On Trump.

item.title: Breaking: Turning On Trump Is Out!
item.description: If you’ve tried to figure out what’s wrong with me, my new book might hold the answer. Buy Turning On Trump Right Now Political activist Ben Murphy tweeted: @peddoc63 Bill’s book, Turning on Trump, is an amazing journey from anti-Trump to pro-Trump. A RT by you will #MAGAhttps://t.co/8u3Qn9C3xo — Ben Murphy (@gomurphy) July 2, 2016 Order Now The book is 180 pages and covers three big periods of thinking about Trump:

item.title: Everybody's Talking About Turning On Trump
item.description: I sent one email to Jamie Allman. He’s such a great guy, he invited me on two of his shows. Probably not because of me, but because of the subject of Turning On Trump. Still, it’s an honor. Thank you, Jamie. If you’re as curious about Turning On Trump as Jamie Allman is, listen to his show on97.1 FM Tuesday, July 5 at 7:20 a.m. We’ll wait while you make a note to listen.

item.title: Watch the Trailer
item.description: https://youtu.be/d02S3EMY6m8 Read all about my new book here
